message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take a bit more of the risk, so I think this is fair.
Your offer was a bit too risky for me. Let's meet in the middle.
I understand you want to meet in the middle, but I need a bit more to account for the risk. This is still a better deal for you than if we were to split evenly in the next round.
Time is running out, and we're losing money. I'm offering you a bit more than an even split in the next round would get you. Let's be reasonable.
